text: Mohammad Mad Malisi () is an Iranian Football Defender who currently plays for Iranian football club Naft Masjed Soleyman in the Iran Pro League. ==Club career== Mad Malisi started his career with Esteghlal Ahvaz from youth levels. He promoted to first team after relegation to Division 2 in 2011. He was a regular starter in his first season with Esteghlal Ahvaz while he helped them to promoting to Division 1. As summer 2013 he joined to Esteghlal Khuzestan with a 3 years contract but failed in making any appearances. He joined Naft Masjed Soleyman in Summer 2014 and made his debut for them as 19 September 2014 against Naft Tehran as a starter. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
